title: HaxColors created by FD
lead_text: YEAH!!! Create custom colors for [HaxBall](http://haxball.com) with the /colors command, the easy way!
about_text: This site is licensed under the [MIT License](LICENSE.txt), and uses [Bootstrap](http://twitter.github.io/bootstrap), [ZeroClipboard](https://github.com/zeroclipboard/ZeroClipboard) and [jscolor](http://jscolor.com). Thanks!
If you have any issue or suggestion, please post it below.
usage_text: If you paste a (valid) /colors command into the bar below, you will get the preview and be able to modify it :)
- Click on the preview (to change avatar color - click on the center of the circle)
- Or adjust parameters on the left
When you're ready, copy the command received at the bottom and paste it into the HaxBall chat bar.
Note: you have to be an admin of the room!
preview_text: You can click and change the colors!
credits: translation improved by ^_^ (Arrows) - a.k.a. the happy cow
